dict.acceptation: 谁；什么人；关系代词，有先行词；孰；

sent.orig: I noticed a misuse of the word "who" in your letter.
sent.trans: 我发现在你的信中误用了who这个词。

sent.orig: He has his name in Who's Who.
sent.trans: 他的名字已上了《名人录》。

sent.orig: He who plays with fire will get burned.; Those who play with fire will burn themselves.
It is perfectly clear who are our friends and who are our foes.
Let others judge who is right and who is wrong.
sent.trans: 谁是谁非，让大家来评个理。
